channel.title: Quest Points are NOT Updating!
channel.description:
I made two quests, they both add one quest point. Yet, When a new player logs (new as in character file just created) it says "QP: 1" in the skills menu... I have no idea why. I made it so that if you make a new character, It sets quest points to 0 (zero). I have no idea whyyyy. This is what I put to display the quest points in the skill menu.
getActionSender().sendString("QP: " + getQuestPoints(), 3985);

item.title: Quest Points are NOT Updating!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Instead of having getQuestPoints() there, put the actual variable for your quest points.
Also, we can’t help you much without code.

Read full topic
